mapper.select: SELECT team_name as name, presentation_score as presentationScore, question_score as questionScore, report_score as reportScore, total_score as totalScore FROM round_score, team WHERE round_score.round_id = #{roundId} AND team.id = round_score.team_id
mapper.insert: insert into round_score (team_id, round_id, presentation_score, report_score, question_score, total_score) values (#{teamId}, #{roundId}, #{presentationScore}, #{reportScore}, #{questionScore}, #{totalScore})

insert into seminar_score (team_id, klass_seminar_id, presentaton_score, report_score, question_score, total_score) values (#{teamId}, #{classSeminarId}, #{presentationScore}, #{reportScore}, #{questionScore}, #{totalScore})
